issue.title: Splitwise Clone
issue.body:
## Overview
Build an expense-sharing app where friends track shared expenses and settle debts.

## Features
- Google OAuth + email/password auth
- Create groups, invite members
- Add expenses, split equally
- Real-time balance calculations
- Settle up functionality
- Live updates with Socket.io

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 App Router
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- Lucide React icons
- SQLite with better-sqlite3
- NextAuth.js
- Socket.io

## Design
- Clean minimal design, mobile-first
- Use shadcn/ui: Card, Button, Input, Avatar, Dialog

## Pages
- Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail, Create group

ems.task: Create project foundation: .gitignore, package.json with all dependencies (Next.js 14, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, better-sqlite3, NextAuth.js, Socket.io, lucide-react), tsconfig.json, next.config.js, and basic folder structure
ems.error: No workers merged - all had conflicts

ems.task: Implement authentication system with NextAuth.js (Google OAuth + email/password), database schema with better-sqlite3 (users, groups, expenses, settlements), API routes for auth operations, and middleware for session management

workers.task: Create authentication system with NextAuth.js - configure NextAuth, implement Google OAuth and credentials provider, create session management utilities
Implement database layer with better-sqlite3 - create schema definitions, database connection, and all CRUD operations for users, groups, expenses, settlements
Create API routes for authentication operations - register endpoint, password reset, user profile management, and auth-related utilities

ems.task: Build core backend logic: group management APIs (create, invite members), expense tracking APIs (add expenses, split equally), real-time balance calculation algorithms, settle up functionality, and Socket.io server setup for live updates

workers.task: Build core backend logic: group management APIs (create, invite members), expense tracking APIs (add expenses, split equally), real-time balance calculation algorithms, settle up functionality, and Socket.io server setup for live updates

ems.task: Create all UI pages using shadcn/ui components: landing page, login page, dashboard (list groups), group detail page (show expenses, balances), create group dialog, and responsive mobile-first layout with Tailwind CSS

workers.task: Create authentication pages (landing page and login page) with UI components
Create dashboard page with groups list and navigation layout
Create group detail page, expense tracking UI, and create group dialog

analysisSummary: Build a Splitwise clone expense-sharing app with Next.js 14, featuring Google/email authentication, group management, expense tracking, real-time balance calculations, and live updates using Socket.io.
